nl.inl.blacklab.search.indexmetadata

Interface IndexMetadataWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexMetadataImpl

    public interface IndexMetadataWriter
    Used to write information about a BlackLab index, including its fields structure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToTokenCount(long tokensProcessed)
      Add some tokens to the total number of tokens in the index.
      String documentFormat()
      Get the document format.
      MetadataFields metadataFields()
      Get the metadata fields.
      AnnotatedField registerAnnotatedField(AnnotatedFieldWriter field)
      Register an annotated field.
      MetadataField registerMetadataField(String name)
      Register a metadata field.
      void save()
      Save the index structure file.
      void setContentViewable(boolean contentViewable)
      Used when creating an index to initialize contentViewable setting.
      void setDisplayName(String displayName)
      Set the display name for this index.
      void setDocumentFormat(String documentFormat)
      Set a document format (or formats) for this index.
      void setTextDirection(TextDirection textDirection)
      Used when creating an index to initialize textDirection setting.
      void updateLastModified()
      Indicate that the index was modified, so that fact will be recorded in the metadata file.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save()
        Save the index structure file.

      • updateLastModified

        void updateLastModified()
        Indicate that the index was modified, so that fact will be recorded in the metadata file.

      • setDisplayName

        void setDisplayName(String displayName)
        Set the display name for this index. Only makes sense in index mode where the change will be saved. Usually called when creating an index.
        Parameters:
        displayName - the display name to set.

      • setDocumentFormat

        void setDocumentFormat(String documentFormat)
        Set a document format (or formats) for this index. This should be a format identifier as understood by the DocumentFormats class (either an abbreviation or a (qualified) class name). It only makes sense to call this in index mode, where this change will be saved.
        Parameters:
        documentFormat - the document format to store

      • addToTokenCount

        void addToTokenCount(long tokensProcessed)
        Add some tokens to the total number of tokens in the index.
        Parameters:
        tokensProcessed - number of tokens to add

      • setContentViewable

        void setContentViewable(boolean contentViewable)
        Used when creating an index to initialize contentViewable setting. Do not use otherwise. It is also used to support a deprecated configuration setting in BlackLab Server, but this use will eventually be removed.
        Parameters:
        contentViewable - whether content may be freely viewed

      • setTextDirection

        void setTextDirection(TextDirection textDirection)
        Used when creating an index to initialize textDirection setting. Do not use otherwise.
        Parameters:
        textDirection - text direction

      • registerMetadataField

        MetadataField registerMetadataField(String name)
        Register a metadata field.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the field
        Returns:
        the field descriptor

      • metadataFields

        MetadataFields metadataFields()
        Get the metadata fields.
        Returns:
        the metadata fields

      • registerAnnotatedField

        AnnotatedField registerAnnotatedField(AnnotatedFieldWriter field)
        Register an annotated field.
        Parameters:
        field - the field
        Returns:
        the field descriptor

      • documentFormat

        String documentFormat()
        Get the document format.
        Returns:
        document format
